title: #74:  Occult Roots of the Modern World with Jason Louv
description:
Welcome to another deep dive into the world of the Occult on this episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode Sam and Ryan welcome author of the new book "John Dee and the Empire of Angels," Jason Louv! This episode the guys discuss....
1) The book "John Dee and the Empire of Angels!" Check out johndee007.com
2) The spiritual act of “Awakening The Third Eye
3) Kundalini Yoga
4) ANCIENT WISDOM HIDDEN THROUGH TIME​​
5) Secret Societies
6) Who was Jon Dee?
https://www.johndee007.com
Come out March 25th for Sam Tripoli's Taping of "Armogedden" and "Zero Fucks" Comedy Special live at the Viper Room at 7:30 and 9:30pm. RSVP at Samtripolilive@gmail.com
Huge Announcement....
The Tin Foil Hat Comedy Night will be live.....
June 1st: San Francisco at Cobbs at http://www.cobbscomedy.com
June 2nd: Sacramento at the Sacramento Punchline
http://www.punchlinesac.com
